columns.name: dgRaTypeCode
columns.description: The category of the package or all packed in one. Complete text to be transmitted: I-White; II-Yellow; III-Yellow instead of I; II; III

columns.name: forProductDg
columns.description: Reference to the ProductDg this DgProductRadiosctive details

columns.name: fissileExceptionReference
columns.description: Fissile exception reference; mandatory if Fissile Exception Indicator is true.

columns.name: transportIndexNumeric
columns.description: Radioactive Transport-Index value of the package or all packed in one. Conditionally mandator and applies to categories II-Yellow and III-Yellow only

columns.name: checks
columns.description: References to the CheckActions performed on the object

columns.name: skeletonIndicator
columns.description: Indicator whether a logistics object is a skeleton object
